text: Mapiripán Airport is an airport serving the town of Mapiripán, in the Meta Department of Colombia. The runway and town are on the north bank of the Guaviare River, which is locally the border between Meta and Guaviare Departments. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Mapiripán *FallingRain - Mapiripán Airport Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Mapiripán Airport
